Classes in aurelienribon.slidinglayout used by aurelienribon.slidinglayout
SLConfig
          A configuration lets you easily layout the children of a SLPanel.
SLKeyframe
          A keyframe wraps a layout configuration together with various parameters, such as the ending and starting sides of new and old components, and the optional delays that can be applied to the components to create some nice effects.
